summary: A 2k HD retex of the Companion\'s Wolf armor to a Skyforge Steel design.
descriptionHtml:
The Companion\'s Wolf armor is built in the Skyforge, along with Skyforge steel weapons, but why is it weak and not made of Skyforge steel?

This 2k HD retex recreates the Wolf armor for both male and females in Skyforge steel.


Updates
-Initial release of v1.0
-Reduction to enhanced textures, removal of weps and esps. v1.1

Additional info
-I will gladly take any suggestions/criticisms into consideration.
-Pm me if you have any questions or requests.

There are no known bugs.

Planning Ahead
-Expect an update to the armor\'s meshes.
author: Scream
